title: ICT-based hierarchical language learning design process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Customized language education program for enhancing job competencies of current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can plan and implement hierarchical language learning designs using ICT tools.
Learners improve workplace language communication skills by at least three levels in an LMS-based asynchronous environment.
Learners monitor their language learning progress through formative assessments and develop improvement plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
